parameters.name: CommodityCode
parameters.description:
The commodity code of the instance. Valid values:

- **dds**: pay-as-you-go replica set instance.

- **badds**: subscription replica set instance.

- **dds\_sharding**: pay-as-you-go sharded cluster instance.

- **badds\_sharding**: subscription sharded cluster instance.

- **badds\_sharding\_intl**: subscription sharded cluster instance on the international site (alibabacloud.com).

- **dds\_sharding\_intl**: pay-as-you-go sharded cluster instance on the international site (alibabacloud.com).

- **badds\_sharding\_jp**: subscription sharded cluster instance on the Japan site.

- **badds\_intl**: subscription replica set instance on the international site (alibabacloud.com).

- **dds\_intl**: pay-as-you-go replica set instance on the international site (alibabacloud.com).

parameters.name: CouponNo
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use a coupon. Valid values:

- **default** or **null** (default): A coupon is used.

- **youhuiquan\_promotion\_option\_id\_for\_blank**: No coupon is used.

parameters.name: DBInstances
parameters.description: A JSON string that contains information about the instance. For parameter details and more examples, see [DBInstances parameter in the DescribePrice operation](~~197291~~).

parameters.name: OrderParamOut
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return order parameters. Valid values:

- **false** (default): The order parameters are not returned.

- **true**: The order parameters are returned.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The order type. Valid values:

- **BUY**: Create an instance.

- **UPGRADE**: Change the configuration of an instance.

- **RENEW**: Renew an instance.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The product code. The default value is **dds**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. Call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the region ID.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. For more information about resource groups, see [View basic information of a resource group](~~151181~~).
